entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
